In arch linux PKGBUILD the pip install command will be executed with --no-dependencies option. All the dependencies will be packaged separately and handled/installed by the systems package manager pacman.

Nevertheless, it makes sense to restrict the backports.weakref requirement to Python < 3.4 in the setup.py file, to avoid unneccessary installation of this package also on other platforms.

body:
In [arch linux PKGBUILD](https://git.archlinux.org/svntogit/community.git/tree/trunk/PKGBUILD?h=packages/tensorflow#n104) the `pip install` command will be executed with `--no-dependencies` option. All the dependencies will be packaged separately and handled/installed by the systems package manager pacman. 

Nevertheless, it makes sense to restrict the `backports.weakref` requirement to Python < 3.4 in the setup.py file, to avoid unneccessary installation of this package also on other platforms.
